customTiles.noTilesFound: No tiles found with the selected filters.

setupSubtitle: Enter your name and begin the session
clearStorage: If it has been more than 2 seconds. Try clearing your cache/local storage.
variationTooltip: <0>Standalone = Its own tile. </0><1>Append Some = 50% chance to add to another action.</1><2>Append Most = 90% chance to add to another action.</2>
languageChangeMessage: You have changed the language from {{fromLanguage}} to {{toLanguage}}. Would you like to rebuild your game board with the new language?
languageChangeExplanation: Rebuilding will create a new board with actions in the selected language.
errorReportedToTeam: The error has been reported to our team.
errorPersistsCheckBack: If the problem persists, please check back in 24 hours.
noActionsAvailableDescription: We couldn't find any available actions for your game configuration. This might be due to a temporary issue or incomplete data migration.
privateOptions: Private rooms also have additional board settings.
realtimeTooltip: Best for playing with others online where if someone leaves, they are gone.
delayedTooltip: Best for playing in person where people will turn off their device between rounds.
privateRequired: Please go to a private room to access these options.
consumptionWarning: Warning: You will have a lot of consumption actions (Alcohol, Poppers, Vaping) compared to any other category. Play with care.
noVoicesAvailable: No voices available for this language
supportedSites: Supported Sites: Reddit (subreddit URLs), YouTube, Vimeo, Google Drive, Tenor, Giphy, Gfycat, RedGifs, Imgur (direct image URLs like i.imgur.com/ID.gif), Dropbox, Twitter/X, Discord CDN, direct media files.
requiresEmbeddedUrl: Note: ThisVid and BoyfriendTV work best with embed URLs, but regular video URLs are also supported.
redditBlocked: Some browsers block Reddit due to tracking protection. Try disabling Enhanced Tracking Protection for this site, or use a different background source.
randomTimerRange: Randomly sets the roll countdown between the picked values.
rebuildBoardDescription: Keep the same settings. New mix of actions.
changeSettingsDescription: Open the settings dialog to fully change the game.
customAdded: Game tile added to your game.
autoCloseModal: This modal will automatically close after {{timeLeft}} seconds.
autoCloseStopped: This modal will no longer automatically close.
pickSomething: Please select at least one action from the Board tab before updating the game.
appendWithAction: Append options require at least one standalone action. Please select a non-append action from the Board tab.
gameDesc: <0>Transform Your Intimate Adventures</0><1>Blitzed Out is a customizable adult experience platform. Whether you're exploring solo, spicing things up as a couple, or hosting an unforgettable party ‚Äî this is your playground.</1><2>Create personalized experiences with endless customization, join private rooms, or discover new adventures with a vibrant community.</2>
customizationFeature: <0>üé≤</0><1>Unlimited Customization</1><2>Create your perfect experience with custom boards, actions, and intensity levels tailored to your desires.</2>
privacyFeature: <0>üîí</0><1>Complete Privacy Control</1><2>Private rooms, local play options, and anonymous sessions. Your privacy and comfort come first.</2>
varietyFeature: <0>üåü</0><1>Endless Variety</1><2>From gentle exploration to intense adventures ‚Äî with community-created content and regular updates.</2>
gettingStartedMainText: Enter your name above to start your session. Customize your experience in the setup wizard. Roll the dice and let the adventure begin.
gettingStartedTip: New to this? Start with lighter intensity levels and explore at your own pace. You can always adjust settings anytime.
gameBoardDescription: Imported Note: 'Settings Generated Board' and 'Imported Board' will be overwritten when their corresponding action is performed UNLESS you rename them.
rebuiltBoard: Rebuilt game board due to room size changes by {{messageUser}}.
boardWrongSize: Board is the wrong size. {{size}} tiles required.
importInvalidTitle: Invalid title for entry {{entry}}. Ensure it is wrapped in brackets and on its own line.
importMissingDescription: Entry {{entry}} is missing a description. All entries must have a description on its own line.
importTitleRequired: Title is required to save a board.
title: Title
ctSeparatorError: Make sure that you add a --- on a new line between game tiles and your groups are wrapped in brackets.
ctGroupError: Invalid group. Ensure your group matching a format listed in 'Add Game Tiles' and is wrapped in brackets.
ctActionError: You need to ensure each entry that has a group also has an action
playingWithPeople: Are you physically interacting with people?
yesInteracting: Yes, I am playing with people.
noInteracting: No, I am playing with myself.
intensityTooltip: As you play, actions will change from lowest level to max level.
standaloneOrCombine: How should we handle consume tasks?
combineWithActions: Combine them with the other actions.
yesOrgasm: Yes, I will at the end.
resetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.

customGroups.createNewGroupsDescription: Create new groups or manage existing custom groups
customGroups.noCustomGroupsFound: No custom groups found. Create your first group using the "Create New" tab.
customGroups.selectTemplateDescription: Select a template to populate the labels below
customGroups.customizeIntensityDescription: Customize the labels for each intensity level. Values are automatically assigned as 1, 2, 3, etc.
customGroups.groupTypeHelp: Determines when this group appears in the Setup Wizard
customGroups.groupLabelHelp: Display name shown to users (max {{maxLength}} chars)
customGroups.gameModeHelp: Select whether this group is for online or in-person game modes
customGroups.deleteGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone.
customGroups.deleteGroupWithTiles: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This will also delete {{count}} associated custom tiles. This action cannot be undone.

groupTypes.foreplay: Foreplay - Appears in local mode (before intimate actions)
groupTypes.sex: Sex - Appears in local mode (intimate actions)
groupTypes.consumption: Consumption - Appears in all modes (drinks, substances, etc.)

errors.selectGroupToExport: Please select a group to export

confirmDeleteBoard: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"?
scheduleFirstGame: Schedule your first game to get started!

scheduleValidation.selectDateTime: Please select a date and time

scheduleValidation.gameAlreadyScheduled: A game is already scheduled for this date and time

typeRequiredError: Type is required when creating a group
optionalLinkHelper: Optional: Link to your stream or meeting
roomTypeDescription: Select the type of room that best fits your playing style.
privateRoomCodeHelp: Share this code with others to join your private room
customizeActionsDesc: Users can fine-tune their action selection and intensity levels below.

yesOrgasmDesc: Build up to a satisfying climax
updatedGameSettings: updated their personal game board settings

tts.sampleText: Take a drink and enjoy the game.

localPlayers.privateRoomRequired: Local players are only available in private rooms to maintain the social nature of local multiplayer.
localPlayers.noPlayersYet: No players added yet. Add at least 2 players to begin.

form.nameHelper: Enter a unique name for this player (2-20 characters)
form.helpText: You can change these settings later if needed.

errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.nameTooLong: Name must be 20 characters or less

noPlayers.description: No local players are currently configured. Set up local players to enable multiple people to share this device.

localPlayersStep.title: Single-Device Multiplayer
localPlayersStep.subtitle: Want to share one device with multiple players? Set up local players for a social gaming experience.

setupOption.title: Shared Device
setupOption.description:
‚úÖ Share one device together
‚úÖ Player names used in action tiles
‚úÖ Perfect for couples or close groups
‚úÖ Better turn coordination
‚ùå Requires at least 2 players
‚ùå Fewer advanced settings available

skipOption.title: Individual Devices
skipOption.description:
‚úÖ Each player has their own device
‚úÖ Full access to advanced settings
‚úÖ Can play alone or with others
‚úÖ Personalized game experience
‚ùå Requires multiple devices for multiplayer
‚ùå Uses placeholder text in actions
‚ùå Turn coordination can be trickier

currentStatus.hasPlayers: You already have local players configured. You can set up new ones or continue with your current setup.
